ai-tha-ap467:1.4_0: I remember it as a great,
ai-tha-ap467:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap467:2.4_0: The palm fruits of this palm tree.
ai-tha-ap467:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap467:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap467:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sumanā.
ai-tha-ap467:7.1_0: The fifth Sumana of the senior Vessavaṇa is the fifth kind of senior,
